saga.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a long and complicated series of events, or a description of this
saga.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The whole saga began back in May.
She launched into the saga of her on-off engagement.
saga.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a long story about events that happen over many years
saga.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: a saga of four generations of the Coleman family
saga.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: one of the stories written about the Vikings of Norway and Iceland
